fields.description: A reportable circumstance is a hazard that did not involve a patient but has the potential to reach patients if not corrected
fields.name: Reportable circumstance

fields.description: A near miss is an incident that involved 1 or more patients but was detected before affecting the patient(s)
fields.name: Near miss

fields.description: An actual incident is an incident which has reached the patient(s)
fields.name: Actual incident
